Settings Handler¶

class settings_handler.setting_container(i_container, o_container, i_shiftreg, o_shiftreg, r_shiftreg, d_shiftreg, p_container, ltcob)¶
__init__(i_container, o_container, i_shiftreg, o_shiftreg, r_shiftreg, d_shiftreg, p_container, ltcob) → None¶

__init__ Initializes the setting_container object.

Parameters

  • i_container (list) – Input container array

  • o_container (list) – Output container array

  • i_shiftreg (shift_object.shiftregister) – input Shiftregister Object

  • o_shiftreg (shift_object.shiftregister) – Output Shift Register Object

  • r_shiftreg (shift_object.shiftregister) – Relay Shift Register Object

  • d_shiftreg (shift_object.shiftregister) – Digital Shift Register Object

  • p_container (list) – PID Container array

  • ltcob (ltc2984.ltc2984) – LTC2984 Object

check_update(uartob)¶

check_update Checks the uart object for new data and updates the settings container accordingly

Parameters

uartob (uart_object.uart_container) – Uart Container Object
